General.Name: Jiangzhong Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiang Zhong Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of Chinese patent medicines and health foods. It offers OTC products for gastrointestinal digestion, upper respiratory tract, and supplements; protein nutrition, tonics, health regimen, probiotics, daily protection, beauty, bone health, and plant liver protection health products; and prescription products. The company sells its products under the Jiangzhong, Jiangzhong Lihuo, Chuyuan, Shenlingcao, Borlock, Yang Jisheng, and Sanghai brands. Jiang Zhong Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd was founded in 1969 and is based in Nanchang, China.

4.Name: Ms. Jing  Tian Yong
